items.title: Data breach reveals Catwatchful ‘stalkerware’ is spying on thousands of phones
items.description: The spyware operation's exposed customer email addresses and passwords were shared with data breach notification service Have I Been Pwned.

items.title: Hacked, leaked, exposed: Why you should never use stalkerware apps
items.description: Using stalkerware is creepy, unethical, potentially illegal, and puts your data and that of your loved ones in danger.

items.title: Microsoft will lay off 9,000 employees, or less than 4% of the company
items.description: Microsoft is leveraging another round of layoffs despite posting consistent growth.

items.title: Tesla faces second straight year of falling sales after another bad quarter

items.title: Rivian receives the next $1B from Volkswagen as sales struggles continue
items.description: Rivian sales ticked back up in Q2 but were down 23% from the same quarter last year. The company has been dealing with affordability issues made worse...
